mapper.select: select dm.zjid,dm.dmmc,dm.dmjc,dm.dmx_bh,dm.dmx_mc,dm.sfdmx,dm.sybz,dm.pxh,dm.bz,to_char(to_date(dm.jlxgsj,'yyyyMMddHH24miss'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')jlxgsj from TB_DMXX dm where dm.ZJID = #{codeId} AND dm.JLYXZT = 1
select max(to_number(dm.pxh))+1 as maxpxh from TB_DMXX dm where 1=1 and dm.DMJC = #{dmjc} and dm.SFDMX = #{sfdmx} AND dm.SYBZ = 1 AND dm.JLYXZT = 1

select dm.zjid,dm.dmmc,dm.dmjc,dm.dmx_bh,dm.dmx_mc,dm.sfdmx,dm.sybz,dm.pxh,dm.bz,to_char(to_date(dm.jlxgsj,'yyyyMMddHH24miss'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')jlxgsj from TB_DMXX dm where 1 = 1 and dm.DMMC like '%'||#{dmmc}||'%' and upper(dm.DMJC) like '%'||upper(#{dmjc})||'%' and upper(dm.DMX_BH) like '%'||upper(#{dmx_bh})||'%' and dm.DMX_MC like '%'||#{dmx_mc}||'%' and dm.PXH like '%'||#{pxh}||'%' and dm.SYBZ = #{sybz} and dm.SFDMX = #{sfdmx} and dm.JLYXZT = #{jlyxzt} order by to_number(dm.pxh)
SELECT T.* FROM TB_DMXX T WHERE T.DMJC = #{dmjc} AND T.SFDMX = 1 AND T.SYBZ = 1 AND T.JLYXZT = 1 ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(PXH)
select count(1) from TB_DMXX dm where 1 = 1 and dm.ZJID != #{zjid} and upper(dm.DMJC) = upper(#{dmjc}) and upper(dm.DMX_BH) = upper(#{dmx_bh}) and dm.SFDMX = #{sfdmx}
